entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy early this evening. Rain showers beginning early this evening then changing to flurries this evening and ending after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 early this evening then becoming northwest 40 gusting to 70 late this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
